mapper.select: select bb.id as bookId,bb.book_name as bookName,bb.book_author as authorName,bb.book_img_url as bookImgUrl from b_books bb where exists (select 1 from b_user_book bub where bub.book_id = bb.id AND bub.deleted_flag = 0) AND bb.deleted_flag = 0

select bb.id ,bb.book_name as bookName ,bb.book_img_url as bookImgUrl ,bb.book_isbn as bookIsbn ,bb.book_author as authorName ,bb.book_desc as bookDesc ,bb.book_press as bookPress ,bb.price from b_books bb where bb.id = #{bookId}
